ingredients: 1 1/4 pound chicken tenders – cut in half, lengthwise
kosher salt / freshly ground black pepper
kosher salt / freshly ground black pepper
1 teaspoon garam masala (found in baking isle, under spices by McCormick)
1 (13.66 fluid ounce) can unsweetened coconut milk
1 lime – 1/2 freshly squeezed (1 tablespoon) 1/2 cut into 4 wedges
